title: RIOT YOU NEED TO MAKE THIS A GAMEMODE RIGHT NOW!!!!!!!!

embed.description: If you want to know how I did it, this may give you some idea: https://imgur.com/a/XvUw3 And there were over a dozen more layers for the crowd and crowd audio.
